revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: Hathyr 17, for the funeral feast of Kalatytis. 1 6-choes jar of wine 2000 drachmas, 6 dinner loaves 190 dr., total 2190 dr. 22 persons, of whom 18 were members and 4 were guests, viz. T� son of Noumenios, Kames son of Harphaesis, Teos son of Petechon, Papnebtynis son of Sokeus, total 4. Total 22 at 100 dr., 2200 dr. In the house ... 20th. 1 6-choes jar of wine 2000 dr., a garland 120 dr., total 2120 dr. 18 members, and � Nephoreges son of Kera( ) and Sen[-- son of N.N.] and as guests Marres son of Pet[--], Petesouchos son of Melas, Chairemon son of Di[--], total 23 at 100 dr., 2300 dr. In the house, 180 dr. Tybi 25. 1 jar of wine 2000 dr., a garland �, 21 persons at 100, 2100 dr., expenses 20 dr.

listBibl.bibl: P.Tebt, I.118 On line 8 see BL v. 1, p. 425; on line 15, see BL v. 2.2, p. 169
